news.title: Google Local Pack Finder Tests Choose Area Feature
news.description: Google is reportedly testing an option to let a searcher select a specific area by name to get local pack finder results.

news.title: Google Launches New Search Menu with Icons
news.description: Google has started rolling out a new search bar that includes both icons and text for search categories, news, video, images, maps, shopping, and other items.

news.title: Google Rolling Out Mobile Search Redesign with Black “Ad” Label, Favicons for Organic Results
news.description: Google is starting to release its mobile search redesign that features a black “Ad” label for paid results and displays favicons for organic results.

news.title: Google to Pre-Announce Future Core Search Algorithm Updates
news.description: In response to a question, Google’s Danny Sullivan said the company will likely pre-announce future updates to its core algorithm.

news.title: Google Responds to a WSJ Report That Concluded There Are Millions of Fake Business Listings on Maps
news.description: In response to an investigation by the Wall Street Journal finding that there are millions of fake business listings on Google Maps, Google issued a response on its blog describing what it does to combat the problem of fake listings.

news.title: The New Google My Business Features Giving Power Back to Local Businesses
news.description: Google My Business announced several new features that may help local businesses maximize the impact of their listings.
